original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
text:
(1) Arthur Kill Road (not seen), west side at its juncture with Kreischer Street, showing the factory buildings of the Kreischer Brick Company, as viewed in a southeasterly direction from the shore of Arthur Kill, near the foot of Androvette Street. Arthur Kill Road is beyond the factory buildings.

September 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) Another view of the abandoned factory buildings viewed in the same direction. In the left background are discernible the two turreted Kreischer houses.

May 3, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) A closer view of the factory ruins. Arthur Kill Road runs directly in front of the Kreischer houses.

May 3, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.

original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
text:
Arthur Kill Road, west side, at its juncture with Kreischer Street, showing the brick works of R. Kreischer & Sons.

October 6, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
text:
Arthur Kill Road, east side, between Kreischer Street and Churchill Avenue, showing two views of one of the Kreischer homes. It was the home of one of the owners of the nearby Kreischer Brick Works.

May 6, 1930
Views 1, 2

P. L. Sperr

original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
text:
Arthur Kill Road, east side, between Kreischer Street and Churchill Avenue, showing two views of one of the Kreischer homes. It was the home of one of the owners of the nearby Kreischer Brick Works.

May 6, 1930

P. L. Sperr

original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
text:
(1) Arthur Kill Road, west side, at its juncture with Kreischer Street, showing the ruins of the Kreischer Brick Company factory. The view is eastward toward the road from near the shore of Arthur Kill.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) Another view from a different angle.

May 3, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) A view across the ruins in a westerly direction toward Arthur Kill from near Arthur Kill Road.

May 3, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.

original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
text:
Arthur Kill Road, west side, at its juncture with Kreischer Street, showing the ruins of the Kreischer Brick Company factory. The view is eastward toward the road from the shore of Arthur Kill. Discernible in the right background is one of the Kreischer homes. This is a set of three views taken the same day.

May 31, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.

original_title: Richmond: Kreischer Street - Arthur Kill Road
text:
Kreischer Street, north from Arthur Kill Road.
May 13, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
